text: Harold Joseph Rahm (February 22, 1919 – November 30, 2019) was a Catholic priest and Jesuit. He was well known for his work with gangs and inner-city youth in El Paso, Texas. From there he went to Campinas, Brazil, where he worked at prevention and treatment of drug addiction. Rahm died on November 30, 2019 in Campinas, Brazil at the age of 100. ==References== ==Other websites== * Padre Haroldo Institute * Christian Leadership Training * Blog * TLC Campinas Category:1919 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American Jesuits Category:Humanitarians Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic priests Category:People from São Paulo (state) Category:People from Texas
title: Harold Rahm
